member.name: M:CMS.Search.TextExtractors.PdfSearchTextExtractor.StripInvalidContentCharacters(System.String)
member.summary: Strips invalid characters from the before being returned as the extracted PDF content.
member.param: Input to strip invalid characters from.
member.returns: Returns input with invalid characters stripped, or null if input is null.
member.remarks: The default implementation strips invalid Unicode surrogate pairs from the .

member.name: M:CMS.Search.TextExtractors.PdfSearchTextExtractor.SafelyExtractContent(CMS.Core.BinaryData)
member.summary: Extracts PDF content and returns it. When an error occurs, empty string is returned and corresponding exception is logged.

member.summary: If true, the extractor first tries to detect the encoding of the file to correctly interpret the text.

member.name: M:CMS.Search.TextExtractors.StreamExtensions.ReadToEnd(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Reads all characters from the current position to the end of the stream.

member.name: T:CMS.Search.TextExtractors.UnicodeUtils
member.summary: Contains a utility method for Unicode characters processing.

member.name: F:CMS.Search.TextExtractors.UnicodeUtils.INVALID_SURROGATE_PAIR_PATTERN
member.summary: Regular expression pattern describing invalid surrogate pair.

member.name: M:CMS.Search.TextExtractors.UnicodeUtils.StripInvalidSurrogatePairs(System.String)
member.summary: Strips invalid surrogate pairs from string. Pairs are stripped either partially (low surrogate is kept) or completely depending on whether the low surrogate is a valid character.
member.param: Input to strip invalid surrogate pairs from.
member.returns: Returns string where invalid surrogate pairs are omitted. Returns null if is null.
member.remarks: A valid surrogate pair is a pair comprising a high surrogate (Unicode character in range 0xD800-0xDFFF) and a low surrogate (Unicode character in range 0xDC00-0xDFFF). A high surrogate followed by a character which does not fall within the low surrogate range is considered invalid.

member.name: M:CMS.Search.TextExtractors.UnicodeUtils.FixInvalidSurrogatePair(System.Text.RegularExpressions.Match)
member.summary: Fixes invalid surrogate pair (or an unpaired high surrogate at the end of a string) by omitting the high surrogate or both the high and the low surrogate depending on whether the low surrogate represents a valid character.
